The cricket ground floods almost completely, and I know because every morning I walk from the gate to the engineering block, my shoes are soaked through. Literally have to try and hop around the river like I'm in Takeshi's castle.

Contrary to popular belief, PES used to be really fun (until 2nd year when who-must-not-br-named took over). My first year was filled with fests (plenty of which I was a core lead), competitions (represented PES at NIT!) and other stuff, made great friends whom I'm still in touch with (some of whom are pursuing Masters with me right now in the same uni), interacted with great profs and published good research. 

PES (and most colleges in our country) are what you make of it.
